languages.text: {n}Ханн делает паузу, затем прямо, почти дерзко добавляет:{/n} "Ваша реакция говорит о том, что вы не ждали посылку с подобным содержимым. Это хорошо. Я почти убедил себя, что {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} намеренно собирает артефакты Хаоса".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ханн делает паузу, затем прямо, почти дерзко добавляет:{/n} "Ваша реакция говорит о том, что вы не ждали посылку с подобным содержимым. Это хорошо. Я почти убедил себя, что {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} намеренно собирает артефакты Хаоса".

languages.text: {n}Hann pauses, then adds bluntly, almost brazenly,{/n} "Your reaction suggests that you were not expecting a package of this sort. That is good to know. I had almost convinced myself that the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} was deliberately collecting Chaos artefacts."
languages.original_text: {n}Ханн делает паузу, затем прямо, почти дерзко добавляет:{/n} "Ваша реакция говорит о том, что вы не ждали посылку с подобным содержимым. Это хорошо. Я почти убедил себя, что {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g} намеренно собирает артефакты Хаоса".

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann pauses, then adds bluntly, almost brazenly,{/n} "Your reaction suggests that you were not expecting a package of this sort. That is good to know. I had almost convinced myself that the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} was deliberately collecting Chaos artefacts."

{n}Hann pauses, then adds bluntly, almost brazenly,{/n} "Your reaction suggests that you were not expecting a package of this sort. That is good to know. I had almost convinced myself that the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} was deliberately collecting Chaos artefacts."

{n}Hann pauses, then adds bluntly, almost brazenly,{/n} "Your reaction suggests that you were not expecting a package of this sort. That is good to know. I had almost convinced myself that the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} was deliberately collecting Chaos artefacts."

{n}Hann pauses, then adds bluntly, almost brazenly,{/n} "Your reaction suggests that you were not expecting a package of this sort. That is good to know. I had almost convinced myself that the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} was deliberately collecting Chaos artefacts."

languages.text: {n}ハンは少し間を置いてから、無遠慮に、厚かましく付け加えた。{/n}「その反応からすると、このような荷物を予想していなかったようですね。それは良かった。あの{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}が意図的に渾沌のアーティファクトを収集しているのではないかと、自分を納得させかけていたので」
languages.original_text: {n}Hann pauses, then adds bluntly, almost brazenly,{/n} "Your reaction suggests that you were not expecting a package of this sort. That is good to know. I had almost convinced myself that the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} was deliberately collecting Chaos artefacts."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハンは少し間を置いてから、無遠慮に、厚かましく付け加えた。{/n}「その反応からすると、このような荷物を予想していなかったようですね。それは良かった。あの{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}が意図的に渾沌のアーチファクトを収集しているのではないかと、自分に納得させかけていたんでね」

languages.text: {n}Hann réfléchit un instant et déclare avec aplomb, presque effrontément :{/n}« Votre réaction indique que vous ne nous attendiez pas à recevoir un tel colis. C'est bon à savoir. Je m'étais presque convaincu que {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}{/g} avait entrepris de collectionner volontairement des artefacts du Chaos. »
languages.original_text: {n}Hann pauses, then adds bluntly, almost brazenly,{/n} "Your reaction suggests that you were not expecting a package of this sort. That is good to know. I had almost convinced myself that the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} was deliberately collecting Chaos artefacts."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann réfléchit un instant et déclare avec aplomb, presque effrontément :{/n}« Votre réaction indique que vous ne nous attendiez pas à recevoir un tel colis. C'est bon à savoir. Je m'étais presque convaincu que {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}{/g} avait entrepris de collectionner volontairement des artefacts du Chaos. »

languages.text: {n}汉恩顿了顿，随后直截了当地补充了一句，几乎带着冒犯的意味。{/n}“您的反应表明，您完全没想到会收到这样的包裹。很高兴得知这样的情况，否则我差点就以为{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}在有意收集混沌造物了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Hann pauses, then adds bluntly, almost brazenly,{/n} "Your reaction suggests that you were not expecting a package of this sort. That is good to know. I had almost convinced myself that the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} was deliberately collecting Chaos artefacts."

traits.locale_text: {n}汉恩顿了顿，随后直截了当地补充了一句，几乎带着冒犯的意味。{/n}“您的反应表明，您完全没想到会收到这样的包裹。很高兴得知这样的情况，否则我差点就以为{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}在有意收集混沌造物了。”

languages.text: {n}Hann hace una pausa y añade sin tapujos, casi con descaro:{/n} «Su reacción sugiere que no esperaba un paquete de esta índole. Es bueno saberlo. Estaba casi convencido de que {mf|el|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} estaba amasando artefactos del Caos a sabiendas».
languages.original_text: {n}Hann pauses, then adds bluntly, almost brazenly,{/n} "Your reaction suggests that you were not expecting a package of this sort. That is good to know. I had almost convinced myself that the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} was deliberately collecting Chaos artefacts."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann hace una pausa y añade sin tapujos, casi con descaro:{/n} «Su reacción sugiere que no esperaba un paquete de esta índole. Es bueno saberlo. Estaba casi convencido de que {mf|el|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} estaba amasando artefactos del Caos a sabiendas».

languages.text: {n}Hann hält inne und fügt dann sehr direkt, fast dreist hinzu:{/n} "Eure Reaktion lässt vermuten, dass Ihr nicht mit einem solchen Paket gerechnet habt. Das ist gut zu wissen. Ich hatte mir schon fast eingeredet, dass {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}{/g} bewusst Chaosartefakte sammelt."
languages.original_text: {n}Hann pauses, then adds bluntly, almost brazenly,{/n} "Your reaction suggests that you were not expecting a package of this sort. That is good to know. I had almost convinced myself that the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} was deliberately collecting Chaos artefacts."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hann hält inne und fügt dann sehr direkt, fast dreist hinzu:{/n} "Eure Reaktion lässt vermuten, dass Ihr nicht mit einem solchen Paket gerechnet habt. Das ist gut zu wissen. Ich hatte mir schon fast eingeredet, dass {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}{/g} bewusst Chaosartefakte sammelt."

languages.text: {n}Hann bir süre duraksıyor, ardından neredeyse pişkince aniden ekliyor.{/n} "Tepkinizden anlaşıldığı üzere bu tip bir paket beklemiyormuşsunuz. Bunu öğrendiğimiz iyi oldu. Az daha {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'in{/g} kasıtlı olarak Kaos eseri topladığını düşünecektim."
languages.original_text: {n}Hann pauses, then adds bluntly, almost brazenly,{/n} "Your reaction suggests that you were not expecting a package of this sort. That is good to know. I had almost convinced myself that the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} was deliberately collecting Chaos artefacts."

traits.locale_text: {n}Han bir süre duraksıyor, ardından neredeyse pişkin bir şekilde, aniden ekliyor:{/n} "Tepkinizden anlaşıldığı üzere bu tip bir paket beklemiyormuşsunuz. Bunu öğrendiğimiz iyi oldu. Neredeyse {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'in kasıtlı olarak Kaos eseri topladığını düşünecektim."
